original_text: But Manasseh led Judah and the people of Jerusalem astray, so that they did more evil than the nations the Lord had destroyed before the Israelites.
korean_text: 유다와 예루살렘 주민이 므낫세의 꾀임을 받고 악을 행한 것이 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 멸하신 모든 나라보다 더욱 심하였더라

sentences.original_text: and the people of Jerusalem astray
so that they did more evil
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 더 악을 행하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: than the nations the Lord had destroyed
